com.cubeia.firebase.api.scheduler
Interface Scheduler<T extends Action>

All Known Subinterfaces:
TableScheduler
public interface Scheduler<T extends Action>

This object manages scheduled actions for a particular object. Using this interface scheduled actions can be associated with a table for later processing. It is important to remember to remove the scheduled action if it is canceled.

Author:
Lars J. Nilsson

Parameters:

Returns:

getAllScheduledGameActions

Returns:
The ids of all known scheduled actions, never null

getScheduledGameActionDelay

long getScheduledGameActionDelay(UUID id)
Parameters:
id - Task id, must not be null
Returns:
The delay in millis for a scheduled action, or -1 if not known

Parameters:
id - Task id, must not be null
Returns:

scheduleAction

UUID scheduleAction(T action,
                    long delay)
Parameters:
action - Action to schedule, must not be null
delay - time in millis to wait until executing this action.
Returns:
a UUID for identifying the scheduled task

cancelAllScheduledActions
